about_the_game:
Venture into the unknown in Backrooms: Dark Labyrinth, the ultimate liminal survival horror experience, immerse in the eerie and unpredictable realm beyond. In this expansive game, developed with an innovative form of procedural generation, each level extends infinitely, ensuring no two expeditions are ever the same. The game’s environments are hauntingly realistic, crafted with meticulous attention to detail to provide a chillingly lifelike experience that will test the nerves of even the most seasoned horror aficionados.

Infinite exploration: Lose yourself in endlessly unfolding rooms and landscapes. From the iconic monotonous mazes of yellow-walled rooms to the chilling, less familiar territories that lurk beyond, each step forward takes you deeper into the labyrinth of levels and sublevels where reality unravels. The game’s advanced procedural generation algorithms ensure every hallway, room, and passageway is unique, and so are the entities and objects that haunt them.
Dynamic Multiplayer: Whether you choose to brave the Backrooms alone or rally a team is up to you, Dark Labyrinth supports up to 8 players. Team up with friends to navigate through the sprawling enigma together. Share resources, strategize survival plans, and rescue each other from the brink in a world that defies reality.

VR Compatibility: Engage in the horror with optional fully integrated VR, letting you manipulate objects and navigate through the game's world in frightening realism. PC and VR players can form mixed teams, immersing in the same spine-chilling sessions, enhancing teamwork and sharing the dread.
Stunning graphics and Atmospheric audio: Experience the chilling atmosphere of the Backrooms with stunning graphics and ambient sounds that make every creak, whisper and drop of falling water come to life. The game leverages visual and audio effects to create an immersive experience that keeps your heart pounding and your senses engaged.

Survival mechanics: Manage your resources wisely — from flashlight batteries and scraps of food to crafting materials. Physical wellbeing is crucial, players must monitor their physical health, along with their nutrition and hydration levels and body temperature. The environment is the predator, not merely a maze, but a symphony of horror and hardship, continuously testing your ability to remain calm under pressure.

Unique and evolving threats: Face off against unpredictable entities. These beings are all unique and evolve and adapt to your playing style, making each encounter uniquely terrifying. Learn their behaviours to survive, but beware — they learn about you too.

Whether on screen or through VR, prepare to explore the depths of the unknown, immerse yourself in the haunting world of Backrooms: Dark Labyrinth, where each step into its infinite expanses could be your last.

Are you ready to step into the Backrooms?

content_descriptors.notes: The level of violence is what you'd expect in a maze inhabited by realistic monsters, but there won't be gratuitous or disturbing violence or gore. The environment is bleak and creepy, but violence and gore is not in your face, the atmosphere is the horror beyond the monsters.

name: Backrooms: Dark Labyrinth

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4130 / AMD FX-4300 or equivalent (4 cores of at 2.5GHz+)
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 265 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Compatible Sound card
  • VR Support: Steam VR Compatible devices
  • Additional Notes: Game may run on lower end systems, especially in lower graphics settings
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600 or above.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon RX 580 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Compatible Sound card
  • VR Support: Steam VR Compatible devices
  • Additional Notes: Game can make use of high end systems with high resolution (4K) and high frame rates (240 FPS+)

short_description: Backrooms: Dark Labyrinth is the ultimate liminal survival horror experience. Multiplayer on screen or via VR, explore the infinite procedurally generated depths of this haunting world where each step could be your last. Are you ready to step into the Backrooms?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
